title: How long does Seagate File Recovery take? - Quora

response.answer_text: The length of time depends on the size of the hard drive itself, the number of files, how badly they are damaged, and the method of communication with the drive (SATA connection will be faster than USB connection) Seagate says 12 hours or more in their documentation to do the detailed scan, then recovery beyond that.
Any file recovery can take obnoxious amount of time. There is no specific time limit all depending on condition of the hdd.
